title: Golden Landscape
description: An exploration of light and land where glowing color evokes reverence for the natural environment’s fleeting brilliance.

title: Tree
description: An expressive, singular tree — standing as a symbol of endurance, rootedness, and our care for the living world.

title: Holiday Possum
description: A whimsical scene, featuring a possum illuminated by holiday lights, blending humor and atmosphere

title: Richard
description: His name is Richard and he is perplexed

title: Knowledge Transfer
description: A headless figure grows a dry trunk from the neck while nurturing a thriving plant in hand

title: Forced Introspection
description: A pandemic piece showing the explosive overwhelm your own thoughts can impose

title: Looking Back
description: A skeletal figure wearing a wide-brimmed hat is depicted from behind, looking over their shoulder. A vibrant red background contrasts the cooler blues used as highlight on the figure

title: Childhood Joy
description: A self portrait from when I was a joyful child

title: Vincent (Red)
description: A study of Vincent van Gogh’s Skeleton with a Burning Cigarette

title: Yawn
description: Portrait of my cat Nemo, capturing personality and motion with painterly texture and affectionate observation

title: Intrusive Thoughts
description: A self-portrait visualizing intrusive thoughts as serpentine forms, exploring the interplay of distortion and emotion

title: Judith Slaying Holofernes
description: Study of Artemisia Gentileschi’s painting, emphasizing gesture and dramatic tension through expressive acrylic strokes

title: Palm Trees
description: An expressive landscape of three palm trees
